sentence: Procter & Gamble Co. (Symbol: PG) has been named as a Top 25 ''Dividend Giant'' by ETF Channel , with a staggering $12.6B worth of stock held by ETFs, and above-average ''DividendRank'' statistics including a strong 3.13% yield, according to the most recent Dividend Channel''DividendRank'' report.
The report noted a strong quarterly dividend history at Procter & Gamble Co., and favorable long-term multi-year growth rates in key fundamental data points.
The annualized dividend paid by Procter & Gamble Co. is $2.7584/share, currently paid in quarterly installments, and its most recent dividend ex-date was on 04/19/2017.
Below is a long-term dividend history chart for PG, which the report stressed as being of key importance.
Indeed, studying a company's past dividend history can be of good help in judging whether the most recent dividend is likely to continue.
